content:
Gahahaha~ When I'm struck by something astonishingly beautiful,
I start spouting lines all scattered and broken.
Must be those fireworks exploding in my head. Gahaha!
info: 闲聊-花火祭即将到来闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Though the world itself doesn't dance,
in that moment when fireworks bloom,
I could've sworn the sky was laughing with joy!
info: 闲聊-花火祭即将到来闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I prepared different masks,
Ready to bloom alongside the fireworks,
But there was no time to change.
info: 闲聊-花火祭即将到来闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Facing these brilliant fireworks,
I choose to look up without fear, because
they're sharing their most joyful moment with me!
